subtitleNullable: This dataset contains 50K generated images of Analog Clocks.
descriptionNullable:
### Context

I was really interested in this idea, to detect the time from analog clocks. It was very time consuming to download the clock images from the web. So I wrote a python script which randomly generates clocks. Using this script I created 50K clock images with their respective labels (time in the clock).

I would really love to see if someone can train CNNs on this dataset and detect the time. I would do it myself and post about it.
